metadata.synopsis: Steeps Evacuation: a family tries to get smuggled past the absolute ships and out of the city. They don't have enough cash so dad decides to stay and let mum and the kids leave first. This is a daughter, Bunny.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to -218;9;-158- Talk to the female child 2.

0.speaker: Bunny
0.text: Papa says I have to be strong to help mama. I don't know if I can be that strong... but I'll try.

1.speaker: Bunny
1.text: Mama says Waterdeep will be safe, but papa will still be here. If you look out for papa, he'll be safe, won't he?

2.speaker: Bunny
2.text: Ooh, you're one of the mean ones! You keep away from papa!
